resources.string: Ghost Mode can only be triggered on rooted devices. You can still see the state of ghost mode without root.
Easy access to restart, power off
Quick Settings is not enabled as an accessibility service and failed to open settings!
Quick Settings is not enabled as an accessibility service. Please enable it in settings.

This permission is required to:

1. Put the phone into sleep mode.
2. Take screenshots.
3. Open the menu that shows up when long clicking power button.
Please grant all permissions for Quick Settings app in Settings.
Please grant \"Modify system settings\" permission for Quick Settings app in Settings.

You must grant it manually using ADB.

ADB method:
1. Enable Developer options (tap Build number 7 times).
2. Enable USB debugging.
3. Connect your phone to a computer. The computer must have platform tools installed.

Run the following command:
adb shell pm grant io.github.codehasan.quicksettings android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
